snippet: Behind an unmarked metal entrance in East Williamsburg hides the other Shea Stadium, a grungy space that is a pillar of Brooklyn’s D.I.Y. music scene.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Shea Stadium, an underground music venue in the East Williamsburg section of Brooklyn that is a pillar of the borough's DIY music scene.
lead_paragraph: Behind an unmarked metal entrance in East Williamsburg hides the other Shea Stadium, a grungy space that is a pillar of Brooklyn’s D.I.Y. music scene.
